data.text: @JimbleKimble25 @WDRBNews @ValerieChinn @JCPSSuper I’m glad you agree it isn’t forever.  But if masks do slow the spread (probably a little), then aren’t you the one advocating to make it last longer?   In the end, we all want the same thing…

@an_thinker @WDRBNews @ValerieChinn @JCPSSuper Speech delays and mental health issues created bc of mask wearing is well documented?!? You obviously don’t know how scientific research is done. Just be Fox News blurts out nonsense doesn’t make it true.

@an_thinker @WDRBNews @ValerieChinn @JCPSSuper Who the hell said wear masks forever? There is a pandemic happening? And we are so close to it getting to the point where we can be back to normal but it’s people like you who is dragging it on.

@JimbleKimble25 @WDRBNews @ValerieChinn @JCPSSuper And masks also have consequences for kid.  Speech delays and mental health are well documented and significant (not just bad parents) and benefits of masking on spread over the long haul are insignificant

@JimbleKimble25 @WDRBNews @ValerieChinn @JCPSSuper So we should force kids to wear masks forever?  I get it - you are a frightened person - but why should everyone be forced to live in a manner that is consistent with your beliefs?  Especially kids who have less risk from this illness than the flu or riding in a car.
@an_thinker @WDRBNews @ValerieChinn @JCPSSuper Masks don’t hurt kids! The only mental health issues incurred are by abusive parents who push their political rhetoric on them.

@WDRBNews @KevinWheatleyKY @ValerieChinn Some JCPS board members are ready to ease the district's COVID-19 mitigation steps while the others are trying to figure out what pronouns to use.  There I fixxed your headline for you.

@WDRBNews @ValerieChinn @JCPSSuper The CDC now says that masks are optional in Jefferson County.  It is time to drop the mask requirement for kids who are the least vulnerable to this virus, yet the most susceptible to the consequences of masking (learning loss, speech delay, mental health).

@WDRBNews @KevinWheatleyKY @ValerieChinn At this point you just have to point and laugh. I feel sorry for any parent that has to deal with that trash. Private school is worth every last penny we spend
